title: Unpaved Road Particulate Matter Emission Rates and Vehicle-Induced Transient Plume Characteristics
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

James Kacer, Ralph Altmaier, David Michael Cwiertny, Patrick O'Shaughnessy
Particulate matter (PM) emitted from unpaved rural roads presents a potential inhalation hazard to people living and working near them. In the absence of site-specific exposure data, plume dispersion modeling...
